title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 11.1 - Affidavit of Compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 11.1 - Affidavit of Compliance

State Regulations

Motor carriers, as defined by section
507-a
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law, must attest to their compliance with such
section by submitting to the Department annually on or before August 3rd the

Drug and Alcohol Testing Passenger Motor Carrier Certificate of

Applicability. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
11.1

Adopted

New

York State Register March 2, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 09, eff. 3/2/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
